page.title: 20BROCTON WOMEN'S INSTITUTE
page.content: Brocton W.I. has about 35 to 40 members and anyone may join by paying her subscription,at present four pounds per year.Most members live in Brocton but a few come from outside the village.We meet every month on the second Wednesday at 7.30pm usually in Brocton Village Hall. A typical meeting would be as follows: BUSINESS - about 1/2 an hour,mainly to give information on other activities outside. SPEAKER - on any topic of interest to members. MEMBER'S - refreshments,competition, trading stall and activity to involve all present. We enjoy meeting,talking with and being concerned about other people at the W.I.and having the chance to be part of the community. (Mrs Christopher Age ?)
